title: Llamil Simes
text:
Llamil Simes (died 20 February 1980) was an Argentine <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>.
Simes began his career with <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Hurac%C3%A1n">Club Atlético Huracán</a> in 1943. He played for the club through 1947, then he joined <a href="Racing%20Club%20de%20Avellaneda">Racing Club de Avellaneda</a> from 1948 to 1955, before finishing his career with <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Tigre">Club Atlético Tigre</a> in 1956. He led the Primera Division in scoring during the 1949 season, tallying 26 goals for Racing, and is one of the league's all-time leading scorers.
